meanings.definition: Relating to or containing chlorine in a lower valence than in chloric compounds.
meanings.sent1: The chlorous solution had a mild smell.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the chlorous compound in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The chlorous liquid seemed to be shy around the other chemicals.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a chlorous breeze.
meanings.sent5: The chlorous color of the liquid reminded him of fresh leaves after rain.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a compound in which chlorine has a valence of three.
meanings.sent1: The chlorous gas was used in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The student learned about the chlorous compound in chemistry class.
meanings.sent3: The chlorous substance seemed to be in a playful mood today.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like chlorous gems in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the chlorous drink was like a hint of nature in every sip.
